name: Create and send WooCommerce coupons from a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet
description:
This template allows you to create a WooCommerce coupon and send it as a Microsoft 365 Email to a given list of customers stored in your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet.

Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers. The template uses [this worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AjJKBs6vWrtygQYCB0SX4TsFv2uR?e=b6xPAj). If you're going to use your own worksheet, make sure email addresses are in your first column.
